Despite increased absolute cash holdings, driven by tax enforcement and low interest rates, UPI transactions now dominate everyday economic activity, indicating cash's growing role as a store of value.

Following a steep decline on its first Monday, the film brought in Rs 4.75 crore, with total domestic earnings now at an impressive Rs 34 crore.

The Magnum Ice Cream Company is set to become its new majority shareholder following an open offer.

title: Set ablaze by hubby, MP woman walks 4km to police, seeks no FIR for kids' sake

Against all odds, she sought refuge in a haystack overnight and managed to escape. The following morning, she courageously trekked nearly 4 kilometers to the police station, ready to tell her story.

The friction arose from MP B Manickam Tagore's remarks on power-sharing and alleged disrespect from DMK leaders. Selvaperunthagai urged action against Tagore, warning of potential alliance strain, and cautioned party members against public statements on alliance issues.

title: Post Op Sindoor, Attari loses its charm; footfall almost halves
description: The Attari-Wagah border ceremony has seen a significant drop in visitor numbers, nearly halving after Operation Sindoor. Changes implemented post-operation, including the removal of the customary handshake and restricted gate openings, have altered the visitor experience. While footfall has improved since the ceremony's resumption, it has not yet returned to pre-operation levels.

title: Addi Smith, mother Tawnia McGeehan die in suspected murder-suicide
description: Tawnia McGeehan and her daughter, Addi Smith, were found dead inside a Las Vegas hotel room after missing a cheer competition. Police believe the Utah mother shot her child before taking her own life. A note was discovered, and the investigation continues. Utah Xtreme Cheer shared an emotional tribute, calling the loss heartbreaking for the entire community.

title: India moves to stop Ravi waters to Pak as Shahpur Kandi dam nears finish
description: India is set to redirect surplus Ravi river water, previously flowing into Pakistan, to its own drought-prone regions once the Shahpur Kandi dam becomes operational. This significant move, expected by March 31, will irrigate vast areas in Punjab and Jammu & Kashmir, marking a strategic shift in water resource management following a policy change regarding the Indus Waters Treaty.

This severe designation, usually for foreign adversaries, would force companies to sever ties with Anthropic to work with the US military. Tensions escalated over AI usage terms and Anthropic's CEO's public concerns.

The firm is strengthening its AI detection, as similar cheating scandals plague the accounting industry, prompting concerns about governance and integrity.

title: 30 minutes, 20km: SUV at 100kmph kills 3, leaves 2 critical in UP
description: A speeding SUV caused a deadly rampage across a 20km stretch in Badaun, UP, on Sunday evening. The vehicle, reportedly traveling at nearly 100kmph, struck at least three motorcycles, resulting in three fatalities and two critical injuries. Witnesses described scenes of panic as the driver fled after each collision. Police are reviewing CCTV footage to apprehend the suspect.

description: The health workers are demanding permanent jobs with a monthly pay of ₹8,000

title: Kurt Van Dyke slain in Costa Rica; girlfriend survives attack
description: American hotel owner Kurt Van Dyke was killed during a robbery at an apartment in Cahuita, Costa Rica. Police say armed suspects tied up his girlfriend, stole valuables, and fled in stolen vehicles. Reports from The Tico Times and Surfer.com confirmed key details. Van Dyke, linked to a historic California surfing family, had lived in Costa Rica for years.

This happened after Diggs's Super Bowl performance. Cardi B stated Diggs remains family despite their split. The couple had unfollowed each other on social media earlier. title: The weight-loss shot everyone wants: Who should actually be taking Mounjaro and Wegovy?
description: Weight loss injections, once for diabetes, are now trending as beauty hacks. Experts warn these prescription drugs, like Mounjaro and Wegovy, are for medically supervised obesity management, not cosmetic use. They're for individuals with a high BMI or related health issues who haven't succeeded with lifestyle changes. Careful doctor consultation is crucial, as certain medical histories preclude their use.

Single genome-editing strategy promises to treat multiple disorders
description: Nonsense mutations account for about a quarter of all known disease-causing genetic changes. Each one halts a different protein at a different point, creating a wide range of disorders that, at present, require separate treatments. Each therapy needs to be designed, tested and approved on its own. This is a slow and expensive process

title: Elon Musk replies to trillionaire post, says have little cash
description: Elon Musk clarified that his substantial net worth is primarily derived from his ownership stakes in Tesla and SpaceX, with less than 0.1% held as cash. He emphasized that the value increase benefits Tesla and SpaceX employees, as well as over 80% of Tesla's retail and institutional investors.

title: 'Don't lecture us, you can go...': Pentagon's warning to Anthropic
description: The Pentagon is reportedly considering ending its partnership with AI firm Anthropic over restrictions on military use of its technology. Anthropic refuses to allow its AI for mass surveillance of citizens or fully autonomous weapons, frustrating defense officials. While other companies are more accommodating, Anthropic's firm stance on ethical guardrails could lead to a complete termination of their collaboration.
